description: The European Commission is assessing the implications for Italy\'s budgetary requirements of lower-than-forecast economic growth this year, European Commission vice president Valdis Dombrovskis said on...
text:
He added that there were concerns about Italy\'s growth as it could be below the 0.2 percent expansion forecast by the Commission, and much lower than the Italian government\'s predictions of 1 percent.
(Reporting by Francesco Guarascio; Editing by Mark Heinrich)
title: EU assessing impact of slower growth on Italy\'s 2019 budget - Dombrovskis
